mapper.insert:
insert into t_enterprise_channel_user_history( uid, channel_user_id, enterprise_id, franchisee_id, tenant_id, type, error_msg, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.uid}, #{item.channelUserId}, #{item.enterpriseId}, #{item.franchiseeId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.type}, #{item.errorMsg}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime} )

update t_enterprise_channel_user_history
type = #{type},
update_time = #{updateTime},
error_msg = #{errorMsg},
id = #{id}
